definition: one's thoughts/mind/intention/willingness to accept new ideas/baseless suspicions
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
to be on the alert/to keep one's eyes open
erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]

sentences.english: Though he looks surly , he has his heart in the right place.
sentences.chinese: 他表面上虽然显得粗暴，可是心眼儿却不错。

sentences.english: How could she be so narrow-minded I'll do something for you.
sentences.chinese: 她怎么能这么小心眼儿？我会帮你的。
她怎么能这么小心眼儿？我会帮你的。

sentences.english: She had a visceral dislike of all things foreign.
sentences.chinese: 凡是外国的东西，她都打心眼儿里讨厌。

sentences.english: Don't is nasty to your little brother.
sentences.chinese: 别跟你小弟弟动坏心眼儿。

sentences.english: It warms the cockles of the heart to see the children so happy.
sentences.chinese: 看到孩子们这么幸福，大家从心眼儿里感到高兴。

sentences.english: I believe that grandpa is partial to my younger brother.
sentences.chinese: 我看爷爷对弟弟是有偏心眼儿的。

sentences.english: You tricked her just to satisfy your petty mind?
sentences.chinese: 你这么愚弄她一回，就是为了满足你的小心眼儿？

sentences.english: Please find it in your heart to forgive me.
sentences.chinese: 请你打心眼儿里原谅我。

sentences.english: You are a bit too touchy to get angry about such a small thing.
sentences.chinese: 你也太小心眼儿了，为这点儿事还生气。

sentences.english: These flawed trade deals are the wrong medicine at the wrong time, Trumka said in a statement yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 这缺心眼儿的贸易协议是错误时间用错了药。

sentences.english: How could she be so narrow-minded?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么能这么小心眼儿？

sentences.english: He looks fierce, but in fact he's kindhearted.
sentences.chinese: 他看起来很凶，其实心眼儿挺好的。

definition: erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
clever-clever/clever in trivial matters/sharp but petty-minded
